tool_description: Evaluates review content against predefined content policies and community guidelines, flagging potential violations.

review_text.description: The review text content to be evaluated

policy_categories.description: List of policy categories to check against

strictness_level.description: Policy enforcement strictness: lenient, moderate, strict

product_category.description: Product category for context-specific policy checks

check_medical_claims.description: Whether to check for unsubstantiated medical claims

error_messages: Empty review text: Review text cannot be empty or null
Invalid policy categories: Use valid policy category names from the approved list
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [lenient, moderate, strict]
Review too long: Review text exceeds maximum length limit of 5000 characters
usage: Provide review text and policy categories to check. Optionally set strictness level and product category for more targeted policy evaluation.

violation_severity.description: Overall severity level of violations found

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for policy violation detection (0-1)

requires_human_review.description: Whether the review requires human moderator attention
